public_remarks: INVESTOR ALERT! Cheerful bungalow nestled in prime location.Walking distance to West Edmonton Mall & 10km to downtown Edmonton.  3 + 1 Bedroom and 2.5 Bathrooms. Main Floor Extended ceilings, 3 Bedroom finish the main floor, basement partially finished  with bedroom and 3 piece bathroom. 8000 square feet private lot from patio door access- 60 ft wide by 130 ft deep. Great investment opportunity for infill or building multiplex. Only fridge is the only appliance included.  NOTE: Foundation issues with south wall & driveway repairs. Quote available from 2022 with reputable foundation repair company. - Buyer needs to accept Title insurance in lieu of RPR with compliance. - Property Sold as is - where is , with no Warranties or representations. (31188654)

Fantastic condo located in sought-after Belgravia - super close to the U of A Hospital, campus, and LRT.  Bus stop right outside the door!  This 3 bed, 2 bath home features hardwood flooring, in-floor heating, corner gas fireplace, in-suite laundry and 2 balconies (East and South)! Living area includes a dining area and is well planned with the fireplace and access to your balcony.  Eat-in kitchen is large and bright with plenty of cupboard and counter space.  Primary bedroom has a huge walk-in closet & 4-pc ensuite complete with soaker tub.  2nd bedroom has a walk-in closet and the 3rd bedroom features its own balcony.  Main balcony is really something with gas BBQ outlet and storage.  Treed location ensure privacy too! Includes tandem stall in the heated u/g parking, a storage locker and all the amenities this building offers!  Wash bay, party room, exercise room and more! (31213734)

Beautiful bungalow home for sale in the desirable neighbourhood of Lynnwood! This 5 bedroom bungalow  has an open concept floor plan leading you towards a cozy living room and a spacious kitchen. There are 3 generously sized bedrooms plus a 4 piece bath on the main level. Basement  is fully finished with a family room, second kitchen , 2 more large bedrooms and another 4 piece bath. Laundry is available on both levels. There are many upgrades throughout the home including newer flooring, remodelled kitchens, plumbing, electrical and newer windows. You have the luxury of parking your vehicles in a Single detached garage or anywhere on the streets around the property to park. This home is complete with a large fully fenced yard and located close to amenities such as schools, playgrounds/parks ,public transportation ,only minutes to drive to West Edmonton Mall , close to the Whitemud Drive and much more . This home is a must see! (31246505)

Stunning, RIVER FACING, LARGE SIZED parcel of VACANT LAND ready for the development of your DREAM HOME!!!  This  CORNER LOT  is located in the desirable neighbourhood of FRASER and surrounded by other beautiful homes  in a private and quiet CUL DE SAC.  This  lot is in close proximity to our beautiful SASKATCHEWAN RIVER , major routes, shopping, bus routes, schools, parks and so much more!! (31043804)

Welcome to the community of Northmount! This unique 2 storey home is a fantastic addition to your growing family with 4 bedrooms on the second floor, 1 bedroom in the basement and 4 living room spaces - that's right, you seen that correctly 4! This beautiful home boasts a large balcony that overlooks the neighborhood and holds 3 wood burning fireplaces; one on the upper level, one on the main floor and another in the basement. The basement features a utility room that includes a laundry room, boiler heating system, HWT and has the connections to include a second kitchen with a side entry direct to basement! Oversized 2 Car Garage for your storage needs. Best of all, this home is near an abundance of entertainment and amenities as it is located on the main road of 137 Avenue and walking distance to North Town Mall and Northgate, a quick drive to Downtown and is easy accessible to the Yellowhead, 97 Street and the Anthony Henday. (30913316)

ONE OF A KIND RAVINE LOT !!  Once in a generation opportunity to own a RARE LOT FLANKED BY MILL CREEK RAVINE.  BUILD YOUR DREAM HOME IMMERSED IN NATURE AND HAVE THE BEST ROOFTOP PATIO IN THE CITY !!  City assessment is $426,000 (30803684)

Welcome to this spacious & private 2-bedroom condo offering breathtaking VIEWS of the RIVER VALLEY. This CORNER UNIT has been updated with modern amenities including AIR CONDITIONING, engineered hardwood flooring and STAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES making it comfortable and stylish. Cozy up by the FIREPLACE in the winter months or enjoy a nice meal on one of your 2 BALCONIES during sunny summer months. The 2 bdrms with ensuite bathrooms provide plenty of privacy and convenience. The UPGRADED LIGHTING gives the space a warm and inviting ambiance. For those who need a secure place to store their bikes or vehicle, this condo has you covered with UNDERGROUND HEATED parking and BIKE STORAGE. There's also an on-site exercise room for when you want to stay active. This condo is located in a prime location, with easy access to downtown, the U of A, the farmer's market, Whyte Ave and many local shops. This is a rare opportunity to live in a well-appointed condo with exceptional amenities and breathtaking views. (30839623)

NO CONDO FEE.. Welcome to the Uplands community where elegance meets convenience! This stunning home Situated in a prime location, this spacious 1415 sqft residence boasts 3 BEDROOMS and 2.5 BATHROOMS,  providing ample space for comfortable living. you'll find an open-concept layout that seamlessly connects the living, dining, and kitchen areas. The home features the expansive kitchen, complete with QUARTZ countertops throughout, a LARGE PANTRY, and modern appliances. Featuring an office space, this home caters to the modern lifestyle, offering flexibility for remote work or study. The upper floor laundry, eliminating the need to lug baskets up and down stairs. The DOUBLE CAR GARAGE, detached for added privacy, provides convenient parking and additional storage options. Conveniently located nearby, an 8.5 km trail offers opportunities for outdoor adventure and exploration. (31228838)

public_remarks: The perfect renovated place to call home (min age is 45 yrs and pets with board approval) and the complex has an INDOOR POOL, HOT TUB, PARTY ROOM, and GAMES ROOM.  2 storey townhome, with A/C, double attached garage, 2 primary bedrooms (one on the main floor) 2 bathrooms PLUS Vaulted CEILING/OPEN TO ABOVE CONCEPT in the living room with a gas fireplace!  PLUS a BONUS ROOM/LOFT upstairs. Renovations include: New kitchen with island and s/s appliances, furnance, floors, plumbing, fixtures, glass railings and more, plus ENJOY the 3 season room outside the dining room with BBQ hook up and it backs onto green space/walking path.  Best location since it is close to every major shopping centre! This is your new home! Basement is ready for your personal development. Some photos are virtually staged. (31292876)

The view is beautiful from up here! This modern, 2bed 2bath, 1060sqft gorgeous condo has been completely renovated over the last few years. This southwest facing condo provides maximum light, an open floor plan with white cabinetry, granite countertops throughout, upgraded S/S appliances, new backsplash, engineered hardwood flooring, new toilets, lights and elegant tiles. Primary and 2nd bedrooms are generously sized each with their own 4-piece bathroom, 2nd bedroom has a walk-in closet with ample room for storage. Bedrooms are located on opposite ends of the living area to provide privacy. Fall in love with the picturesque views from the south-facing balcony while sipping coffee or BBQing. Corner electric fireplace w/mantel, A/C, Hunter Douglas blinds, underground parking and in suite laundry complete this home. Steps away from the convenience of LRT, coffee shops, grocery stores, trendy restaurants, downtown core, and River Valley. Minutes away from the Royal Glenora Club, U of A, and Ice District. (31078252)

TREELINE VIEWS from this 1044 sq.ft. CORNER UNIT facing SOUTH & WEST in GRANDIN MANOR conveniently located with the LRT at your doorstep, close to the river valley trails, the Legislature & quick access to the Ice District, U of A, U of A Hospital, Brewery District & the Royal Glenora Club.  This gorgeous home has an open floor plan with the bedrooms at opposite ends of the living area, QUARTZ countertops in the kitchen, stainless steel appliances, engineered hardwood flooring throughout, corner electric fireplace.  The main 4 piece bathroom is next to the 2nd bedroom that has a walk-in closet.  4 piece ensuite bathroom in the primary bedroom.  South facing balcony with a gas BBQ outlet. Included:  Fridge, ceramic top stove, built-in microwave, dishwasher, INSUITE WASHER & DRYER, window coverings & A/C.  TWO TITLED PARKING STALLS - 1 UNDERGROUND (#154 on P2) & 1 OUTSIDE (#259).  The building amenities include an exercise room, meeting room & visitor parking.  A very well run building.  Shows beautifully! (31066321)

Executive 2 storey condo on Saskatchewan Drive with a view. This nearly 2000 sqft condo offers 3 bedrooms and 2 full bath. Main floor offers tons of natural light and a very unique layout. Large living room with 3 sided fireplace, a flex area perfect for additional seating/entertaining and doors leading out to the patio. Kitchen features stainless steel appliances, beautiful white cabinets, pantry and large dining/nook area with another door leading out to the patio. 3 piece bath and laundry complete the main level. Spiral staircase leads you to 3 large bedrooms and loft space. Primary bedroom can accommodate king size bed, walk-in closet and 4-piece ensuite with jacuzzi tub and separate shower. Entrance to the unit from both the main level and second level, with elevator access to both. Open to below offering lots of windows. Location can't be beat, steps to the river valley, minutes from the U of A, downtown and trendy restaurants and shopping. Secured underground parking with storage included. (31107349)

Discover an exceptional find: a stunning 5-lvl split with a walk-out basement! Recently renovated to perfection,this home boasts captivating hardwood floors throughout,vaulted ceiling,skylight & New Cabinets complemented by brand new Corian Countertops everywhere,Tiled backsplash & New cabinets & New Appliances in the Kitchen! New everything in the main floor bathroom & remodeled laundry room,updated cabinets in the Ensuite too!The spacious bedrooms feature ample closets,offering both comfort & convenience.Delight in the newly renovated RecRoom showcasing all New Flooring,entertainment center, den area & it is wide open now with access to the walk out yard & deck! From the Dining room,step outside to the charming back deck overlooking a picturesque walkway.2523 sq ft of living space!Enjoy the perks of 18+ living in this inviting community,conveniently located near shopping centers with easy access to both Henday & Whitemud.Pets are welcome with board approval.Don't miss out on this remarkable opportunity! (31123339)

Welcome to McCauley! This home features a total living space of 2,070+ sqft with 8 bedrooms in total & 2.5 baths and a fully-fenced backyard! You are welcomed into the spacious living room w/ bay windows, a galley kitchen, and a spacious dining area! this home has a large primary bedroom with a 2-pc ensuite + 2 full-size bedrooms & a common 4-pc bath on the main floor! The basement features a 3-pc bath and 5 ample-sized bedrooms, perfect for when guests or relatives stay over! Close to all amenities, including transportation, restaurants, shopping, and schools, and a few minute's drive to DOWNTOWN Edmonton, the Victoria School of Arts, gyms, NAIT, and MacEwan! This home is for those who are leading an active lifestyle! (30869082)

SPECTACULAR 2067 sq.ft. 3 storey townhome located in the desirable community of RIVERDALE surrounded by river valley trails, a short walk to the neighborhood Little Brick Caf, parks, Riverside Golf Course & Downtown.  On the main floor is a gourmet kitchen with espresso color cabinetry & hardwood flooring, granite countertops, good size counter height island, stainless steel appliances, walk-in pantry/laundry, double sided gas fireplace, east facing balcony.  The 2nd level features 2 master bedrooms each with their own ensuite & walk-in closets.  The 3rd level is a spectacular loft that can be used as a bedroom or bonus room with a good size deck facing east as well as a 3 piece bathroom.  Included is the fridge, ceramic top stove, built-in microwave, dishwasher, high efficiency washer & dryer, all window coverings, built-in vacuum & A/C.  Attached tandem garage.  Shows very well. (31216847)

ORIGINAL OWNERS in a PRIME location! This home is packed with character and has been lovingly maintained since originally built. Upstairs is 3 beds, 4pc bath, kitchen overlooking dining space and living room with wood burning fp. Down stairs is a 4th bedroom, laundry area w/sink, rec room w/bar and a wood stove! This home has a new HWT , some vinyl windows, roll down shutters, newer shingles, central vac, OVERSIZED double garage w/back alley access and a large yard w/gazebo. This is a vintage home and a rare find. Close to downtown, university, river valley and more. This is an excellent revenue location or easy flip! (31188634)

Spectacular two storey half duplex in Canora with double detached garage and no condo fees. Boasting approximately 1800 Sqft above grade not including unfinished basement with SEPARATE ENTRANCE TO BASEMENT. Upon entry you are greeted with a spacious formal living room. As you make your way to the open concept kitchen with large walk in pantry overlooking the second living area complete with fireplace. Main floor is complete with a two piece washroom. The upper floor is complete with three spacious bedrooms including a full bath. The primary has huge bay windows and a large walk in closet. The ensuite has a jetted tub and separate shower. Nicely refreshed and very well taken care of turnkey home. Just move in! (31190584)

Welcome to the Carlton neighborhood, where this inviting north-facing bi-level home pairs family-friendly charm with excellent investment prospects. The front porch beckons you into a shared entrance, leading to a luminous main floor that boasts two well-appointed bedrooms and a recently updated 4pc bath. A heartwarming kitchen with abundant counterspace flows into the dining area, adorned with balcony doors that open to an expansive deck overseeing a sprawling, fully-fenced backyard  a haven for pets and playtime. The legal basement suite, illuminated by the bi-level architectures tall windows, includes two bedrooms and a practical 3pc bath, ensuring a high-comfort living experience. With parking for four at the rear and situated a stones throw from Elizabeth Finch School, key 127 St amenities, and quick access to 153 Ave and Anthony Henday, this home offers unparalleled connectivity and a promise of steady rental appeal (31190608)

Welcome to Starling -a wonderful family community giving a country living vibe with the convenience of being close to amenities!  This amazing half duplex was a former show home and so you'll enjoy the extra features, including air conditioning & upgraded flooring.  The main floor has a welcoming foyer, leading to the great room area with a cozy electric fireplace.  The kitchen offers a corner pantry, island with eating bar & quartz counter tops plus a spacious dining area with doors to your deck & outdoor living space.  There is a convenient half bath here & walk in closet at the garage entry.  Upstairs is perfectly designed with two primary suites - both feature walk-in closets and full ensuite baths.  The laundry room is here and a spacious loft area is a perfect place to work from home.  The basement is also fully developed with a large rec. room, a third bedroom & a full bath plus LOTS of storage!  With a view of the Big Lake recreation area this home offers amazing features & value. (31190630)

Embrace opportunity along 137 Ave, where this alluring property opens its doors to a well-designed main floor with hardwood and ceramic tile, three cozy bedrooms, and two modern bathrooms, including an expansive 4pc ensuite. Descend to the comfort of a legal basement suite featuring two bedrooms, and two baths (1 3pc and 1 4pc), complemented by a separate utility room ensuring tenant tranquility. Venture outside to a south-facing backyard, an inviting canvas for pets or play, fully enclosed with a mix of chain-link and wood fencing, connected by a deck to the main bedroom. A dual-door double garage unveils potential for division and enhanced rental income. Located in a neighborhood prized for its proximity to essential amenities and lively venues, this home is a haven for house hackers and investors alike, promising a blend of lifestyle and financial savvy. (31191775)

BEST VALUE IN WESTMOUNT !! Welcome home to this charming half duplex located mere steps from Westmount Mall and all the charm of 124th Street and all it has to offer including boutique shops, restaurants, and much much more. The property features 3 generous sized bedrooms including large primary bedroom with 2 PIECE ENSUITE & AC. Kitchen has been updated and features NEWER STAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES, NEWER CABINETS, NEWER TILE BACKSPLASH, and NEWER COUNTERTOPS. Living room is spacious and offers a cozy fireplace and sliding glass patio doors leading you to a large low maintenance deck and spacious yard perfect for entertaining or small children. Basement is partly developed and offers loads of potential. Single garage perfect for our long and cold Edmonton winters. The front driveway offers a rubberized portion to it. Close to the downtown core, close to the river valley, minutes to the west end, and close to Groat Road making your daily commute a breeze. Great value, great location, do not miss this one. (31211612)

Located in One of Edmonton's premiere Neighborhood's in Fulton Place 1067Sq. Ft 3+1 bedroom.  Custom built Fekete Home! solid wood Kitchen Cabinets. Home is immaculate in condition enjoy the south facing Back yard (31203601)

This sophisticated unit is a luxurious one-bedroom plus den with two bathrooms and a total of 1,195.88 square feet of living space in the premier Properties on High Street building in Edmonton. Featuring a modern open floor plan with hardwood floors, maple cupboards, and stylish decor, it offers a gas fireplace, and east-facing views of the street. Built in 2002, the unit boasts 9-foot ceilings, air conditioning, and access to amenities such as an exercise room, beautiful garden area, and pond. Conveniently located near shops, restaurants, and transportation, this property is ideal for those seeking upscale urban living. (31239313)

Welcome to this beautifully updated bungalow nestled in the charming neighbourhood of Prince Rupert! As you step inside, you'll be greeted by an inviting open concept living and dining area flooded with natural light. The kitchen boasts a large window and features stainless steel appliances. With three bedrooms and laundry upstairs and two additional bedrooms, a kitchen, and laundry in the basement, there's plenty of space for privacy. Each floor also offers a 4-piece bathroom for added comfort and convenience. Youll find plenty of updates that enhance both the aesthetics and functionality of the home. The shingles were recently replaced in 2022, ensuring years of worry-free maintenance, while the eaves were updated in 2020 for improved drainage. Grading work was done in 2023 and the chain link fence was installed in 2022. Most windows have been replaced between 2015 and 2019, providing energy efficiency and a fresh, modern look throughout the home. Don't miss out on this opportunity! (31240228)

European Styled condo for refined living nestled in the heart of Grandin. This stunning three-level upgraded split condo exemplifies modern elegance and offers a sanctuary of comfort and style. Upon entering, you're greeted by the grandeur of vaulted ceilings that accentuate the spaciousness of the living areas. The gleaming hardwood floors flow seamlessly throughout. Natural light pours in through the newly installed triple pane windows, casting a warm glow on the contemporary interiors. Gourmet kitchen offers open shelving, high end appliances complete with eating bar and dining area with access to sunny deck. The upgraded baths boast luxurious finishes and fixtures, providing a spa-like experience right at home. Tranquil primary complete with great closet space. Fully finished basement offers versatile space with it's cozy family room, 2 spacious bedrooms, bath and great storage. South facing deck overlooks greenspace with ideal access to amenities.  Freshly painted & loaded with upgrades. Welcome Home (31243309)

Amazing value with attention to detail throughout on this upgraded 3+1 bedroom bungalow in McLeod! The main floor features a remodeled kitchen with oak cabinetry, new granite countertops with glass tile back splash, newer top-of-the-line appliances, including pullouts and pot drawers. The bathroom and ensuite boast all new fixtures, including a jacuzzi tub.   All main floor windows and bay windows have been replaced and central A/C to keep cool in our hot summers! The house has been freshly painted with newer floors throughout. Outside, you'll find a gorgeous mature yard as well as a large RV parking pad.  The huge oversized 22x28 garage with a 9' ceiling is perfect for all your storage needs. The fully finished basement includes a rec room, large bedroom, laundry, and loads of storage.  Located close to all amenities, parks, recreation, and transportation, with K-12 schools within a 10-minute walk, this is the perfect family home! (31230032)

LORELEI BILEVEL!!  1293 Sq. Ft. Bilevel with 3+1 bedrooms, 4 FULL BATHS, fully finished basement & double detached garage.  Loads of upgrades incl; main floor windows, H20 tank (4 months), shingles on garage (just completed), kitchen with updated cabinets, granite counters & huge island, main bath with new tile work, vanity & granite.  Brand new modern lighting, luxury vinyl plank flooring just installed & freshly painted in neutral tones!  The oversized windows bring in an abundance of sunlight to this fantastic floor plan with stairwell access to the basement from BOTH the front & rear of the home.  Basement hookups are present for a future 2nd kitchen.  The functional basement features a family room, 4th bdrm, den, 4 pce bath + 3 piece bath with laundry, but otherwise awaits a new owner's creative updates.  2 Schools within walking distance as well as easy access to convenience store & daycare.  5 Min. drive to 97 Street and Henday.  So many possibilities for a great family home or investment property. (31231142)

Best price for this fully serviced, pie shaped, 32 foot by 130 foot X140ft ( on one side) x 41 foot lot (back side) minutes to the RIVER VALLEY. Amazing VALUE! Fantastic bungalow on a huge, sunny lot! Featuring beautiful wood beams, an updated white kitchen and a south facing backyard, this home has endless opportunities. From young families just getting started to empty nesters looking to downsize with a place to park their RV, this property can work for almost anyone. The functional floor plan provides an updated kitchen that opens up to the comfortable living room and 3 bedrooms on the main floor. The basement includes a large rec room plus ample space to transform into whatever you want - more bedrooms, another bathroom or even a home gym or office! Situated on a sprawling corner lot spanning 808m2, the property is perfect for planting a large garden, backyard BBQ's or even future development. Just steps from the incredible St. Albert Farmer's Market, schools, walking trails, the river valley and even an outdoor pool, the location is hard to beat. (31256797)

Wonderfully located within minutes to schools, rec centers, restaurants, and more! Your new home is by far one of the brightest and spacious in the neighbourhood, featuring large windows for plenty of natural sunlight, tastefully chosen finishes throughout to maximize brightness, and featuring 9-foot ceilings on the main floor providing a spacious and airy atmosphere. Stylish living room includes a cozy stone faced gas fireplace leading to an open concept kitchen/dining area. Your upscale kitchen is adorned with upgraded features including stainless steel appliances, tiled back splash, ceiling high cabinets, classy granite countertops, and a peninsula for added counter space!  Upper floor includes an enormous master bedroom with walk in closet and lovely ensuite as well as two more spacious bedrooms. Gorgeous backyard highlighted by a beautiful deck. Other features include air conditioning,  an over sized garage and a front porch veranda, perfect for enjoying outdoor moments! (31254661)

Welcome to this large 2010 built two-storey in McCauley, with SEPARATE entrance to basement! Offering a total of 8 bedrooms and 4 full bathrooms, the house can easily accommodate two families! Main floor has a big living/ dining room, two good-size bedrooms, a modern kitchen, and a 4-piece bathroom. Upstairs is a huge primary bedroom with ensuite, three more bedrooms, a bonus room, and a full Bath. The bright basement can be a mortgage helper, featuring its own side entrance, a a huge recreation room with a second kitchen, two bedrooms with big windows, and a fourth full bathroom. The property is also ideal for a rooming house. Large backyard with plenty of space for parking or adding a garage. Enjoy living in a newer home while being a few minutes from DOWNTOWN Edmonton, MacEwan, Victoria School of Arts, and gyms. Close to shopping, transportation and restaurants. Great value! (31110309)

This newly built, 3-storey townhome combines comfort with clean lines by embracing soft whites and organic wood grains accented on the floor and in the cabinet feature colour. The 2 bedroom and 2.5 bathroom home is equipped with carpet in the stairwells, upper hall, bedrooms and WIC, polished chrome plumbing fixtures and accessories, and 6 x 6 matte white subway tile backsplash in the kitchen. Offering a open-concept kitchen layout, this townhome also features an island bump out, quartz countertops in the kitchen and bathroom, stainless steel appliances, premium vinyl plank flooring, and the laundry room at bedroom level. Shoveling snow, cutting grass, and landscaping all taken care of for you so you can take advantage of Midtown's close proximity to all St. Albert conveniences, including Rondeau Park. Ready for Immediate Possession. Finishes may differ. Some photos may be virtually staged. Photos are representative. (30635530)

Built with Averton's elevated standards, this Trailside C townhome at Midtown is equipped with LVP in pantry, dining room, kitchen, great room, and powder room, 4 x 16 matte white subway tile backsplash and quartz countertop throughout the kitchen, laundry on the bedroom level, a 42 wide main bathroom mirror to match the vanity, 9' main floor ceilings, oversized windows, and stainless steel appliances in the kitchen. The 2 bedroom and 2.5 bathroom townhome features white cabinets in the main floor and cool wood grain floors that provide depth and a relaxing palette. The home's quality exterior is finished with premium James Hardie siding, a nest video doorbell, and is solar panel ready. With 45 acres of neighbourhood connections and everyday conveniences right at your doorstep, this sustainable townhome is energy efficient and part of the first BUILT GREEN community. Ready for Immediate Possession. (30636141)

Welcome to Cobogo Lofts! Located in the Heart of Downtown Edmonton's entertainment district & on prestigious 104 ST. This New York, soho inspired historical building has been converted into some of Edmonton's most sought after living quarters. Unit 103 showcases, 1,230 sqft, 1 bedroom + DEN, open concept layout, 1.5 bathrooms, GORGEOUS INTERIOR w/ exposed BRICK walls, TIMBER support beams, 10.5 ft. ceilings, GLAZED CONCRETE & RUSTIC WOOD floors! Barn door separates the spacious 4pc bath w/cast-iron claw foot soaker tub/shower & elegant vanity. Good sized kitchen w/gas stove, Bosch DW, eat-in island & loads of maple cabinetry! public_remarks: Prepare to be impressed by this stunning 2.5-storey Westridge Greens townhouse, nestled alongside the serene Wolf Willow Ravine - offering a peaceful retreat from city life! Step into the inviting main floor, where a chef's kitchen awaits with stainless steel appliances, a commercial-grade gas stove top. The adjacent dining area provides a picturesque backdrop of the ravine, while the spacious living room features a wood-burning fireplace with exquisite tile-facing. Ascend to the second floor to discover the master bedroom retreat with a spa-like ensuite. Around the corner you will find one bed with a private balcony, a den, and a full bath. The loft offers a wet bar, family room, and another balcony with ravine views. Throughout the home, upgraded hardwood and ceramic tile floors add elegance, while new paint and trim enhance the overall aesthetic. Don't miss this exceptional opportunity for urban luxury with a lock up and leave lifestyle. Steps to the River valley! (31217450)

address: # 2 903 CRYSTALLINA NERA WY NW|Edmonton, Alberta T5Z0N6
public_remarks: Welcome to the great community of Crystallina Nera in Northwest Edmonton. This is a townhouse, recently built in 2023! This house offers a spacious main floor with a flex room that is greet for you as you enter! The second floor includes a finished open kitchen style with fully upgraded stainless-steel appliances and, a quartz countertop with lots of storage space. The house features fabulous, custom lighting, vinyl flooring and a large balcony. The third floor offers a spacious master bedroom and has an ensuite bathroom. There are two additional bedrooms, a 4 PC main bathroom and a laundry room complete the top floor. There is a double attached garage which easily accommodates 2 vehicles.ETS transit puts convenience at your doorstep. Must have a look! Don't miss this!! (31232017)

Welcome to Allendale! Excellent redevelopment or renovation opportunity! This 1,027sqft raised bungalow is situated on a beautifully treelined street on a 5,725 sqft lot. Outside, the detached double garage and expansive yard provide plenty of room for outdoor activities. Excellent central location with easy access to University, Whitemud Freeway, Southgate Mall, Whyte Ave and more! (31230048)

Immaculate Family Home in Edmonton's Coveted Northeast Community. This exquisite property offers an ideal blend of elegance, functionality, and comfort, making it the perfect home for families seeking a peaceful and luxurious lifestyle. Situated in a beautiful neighbourhood, this stunning residence boasts an impressive array of features.  With a new roof, new furnace and hot water all installed in 2021, and a partially finished basement plumbed for kitchen/wet bar. This home comes with dark hardwood in the living room and a 2 piece bathroom on the main floor. The large kitchen has tile, dark maple finished, eat-in kitchen style and a back closet and pantry, there's no shortage of storage! There's a garden door that leads to the deck. Just off the deck you'll enter a beautiful backyard with an open fence, fire pit, and shed. Located in a family-friendly community, this home is within close proximity to schools, parks, shopping centers, and various amenities. (30566169)

The large living room connects to a dining room that is handily placed next to the bright and airy south facing kitchen. Downstairs there is a separate unregistered suite with its own kitchen, bathroom and laundry facilities. The kitchen is south facing and has a nice big window that lets in lots of light and air. It also has a nice pantry, a built-in dishwasher and a moveable island for extra prep space. The large bedroom has an egress window and a walk-in closet and in addition there is a den that makes a great office or play room. Parking is a two-vehicle pad with back alley access. (31238248)

fantastic investment property. 50x150 ft lot zoned RA7 The house is very solid and has master bedroom with 3 piece ensuite as well as 2 additional good size bedrooms. tons of upgrades including newer roof weeping tile and sump pump. great holding property to build multi family or apartment complex. You'll taste that homegrown olive oil drizzled over your next crisp greek salad in your spacious kitchen.  You'll even be peering overhead from your beautiful back patio to imagine grapes being crushed to produce the choicest of wines nearby. This property is like a fine wine that will awaken your senses. public_remarks: GORGEOUS BRICK BUNGALOW in a PRIVATE TREED COURT - Located in a mature community just a short walk to Riverbend Square where you have access to ever service possible. From flower shops and grocery stores, to doctors and tire shops, it's all at your doorstep. Close to everything, yet tucked away on a quiet private road, and surrounded by mature trees and 19 other beautiful bungalows making a wonderful community, with incredible neighbours. The home itself looks solid with a premium feel seldom found in our market. Inside you have almost 3,000 sqft of living space on two levels, 9 foot ceilings and newer updated appliances. You're welcomed by a central hall with a nice view of the living area that floods the home with natural light through it's massive windows. There's a south facing den, a large open kitchen overlooking the living space leading to a 170 sqft deck surrounded by mature trees. And we haven't touched on the basement where you have a large family room, additional bedroom full bath plus storage. (31293958)

The location is simply unbeatable  you'll be within walking distance to scenic parks, top-rated schools, and the charming Parkview shopping centre, offering a variety of local shops, cafes, and restaurants.   Whether you're a growing family, a professional seeking a serene place to call home, or a developer looking for the next big project, this lot is the perfect canvas to bring your vision to life. (30979979)

A MUST SEE! 1693 sqft. in IMMACULATE condition duplex is located in the friendly neighborhood of Stewart Greens, with all amenities established, schools and playgrounds near. This home accommodates 3 large size bedrooms & 2.1 bathrooms. Upon entering the home you are greeted by the open-concept space which is flooded with natural light. The kitchen features quartz counter tops, wood cabinetry, and a large dinning room which opens to the adjacent living area. The large living room features a grand window that overlooks the backyard. The main-floor is completed with a half-bath. Upstairs you find a master bedroom with a gorgeous en-suite with his & hers sinks, shower, and Jacuzzi tub. The master bedroom also includes a beautiful walk-in closet. Upstairs you will find another 2 large sized bedrooms, a 4 piece bathroom and laundry room. The huge unfinished basement includes 2 large windows and a rough in for a washroom is ready for your personal touches. Deck is already in place for your summer enjoyment. (31228906)

Great opportunity in Ritchie with this 3-bedroom bungalow with a legal basement suite. The main floor offers a spacious living room and open concept kitchen and dining area. 3 bedrooms down the hall next to the 4-piece bathroom. Separate entrance to the basement suite which has a bright kitchen, open concept living area, 3 bedrooms and bathroom. The shared laundry is also on this level. Single oversized detached garage and extra parking at the back. Situated on a tree lined street, walking distance to the Mill Creek Ravine. Easy access to public transit, close to Whyte Avenue and Downtown. (31280950)

address: 772 CY BECKER DR NW|Edmonton, Alberta T5Y0W3
public_remarks: Welcome to this stunning custom built home by Primary Homes and is located in the heart of Cy Becker Landing. This home offers over 1780+ sq ft of living space. The open concept main floor has a massive living room that is open to the kitchen and nook area. The second level features a total of 3 bedrooms , 2 full baths and a upper floor laundry. The unspoiled basement has a side separate entrance that is perfect for a future income suite. The home is located only minutes from Manning drive and Anthony Henday. Close to all amenities. *** Home is under construction and will be complete by mid may *** (31182020)

Welcome to the Blackwood built by the award-winning builder Pacesetter homes and is located in the heart of Crystalina Nera. The Blackwood has an open concept floorplan with plenty of living space. Three bedrooms and two-and-a-half bathrooms are laid out to maximize functionality, allowing for a large upstairs laundry room and sizeable owners suite. The main floor showcases a large great room and dining nook leading into the kitchen which has a good deal of cabinet and counter space and also a pantry for extra storage. Close to all amenities and easy access to the Anthony Henday and Manning Drive.  This home also has a side separate entrance that's perfect for a future potential legal suite. *** Photos are from a previously built home which is the same layout and finishing's, the colors will vary, This home is under construction and is slated to be completed this July of 2024 *** (30933522)

Welcome to the Brooklyn built by the award-winning builder Pacesetter homes and is located in the heart of North East Edmonton's newest communities of Marquis.  Marquis is located just steps from the river valley . The Brooklyn model is 1,648 square feet and has a stunning floorplan with plenty of open space. Three bedrooms and two-and-a-half bathrooms are laid out to maximize functionality, making way for a spacious bonus room area, upstairs laundry, and an open to above staircase. The kitchen has an L-shaped design that includes a large island which is next to a sizeable nook and great room with stunning 3 panel windows. Close to all amenities and easy access to the Anthony Henday and Manning Drive. This home also ha a side separate entrance and two large windows perfect for a future income suite. This home is now move in ready! (30957171)

NO CONDO FEES!! This 4-level townhouse is nestled in the prestigious community of Cloverdale. Step into warmth, gleaming hardwood floors,high ceilings and 2560 sq ft of spacious living areas. The main level unveils a gourmet kitchen, adorned with modern appliances, premium finishes, and large dining seating for 12, perfect entertaining guests. Offering 4 bedrooms and 3.5 baths strategically placed throughout the home. The primary suite, situated on its private level, features an en-suite bathroom and private deck with panoramic views of the surrounding beauty. There is plenty of room for the entire family with a bonus room on the 2nd level. The sleek design offers high-end fixtures, vaulted ceilings and modern color tones. Situated just steps away from parks and trails, and Edmonton Ski Club, this townhouse provides a seamless connection to nature.  Residents can easily embrace and active lifestyle enjoying the outdoor and serene walk in the nearby green spaces.  NO CONDO FEES! (30859741)

address: 3431 CAMERON HEIGHTS CV NW|Edmonton, Alberta T6M0R5
public_remarks: Embrace luxury in Cameron Heights with this modern 1350+ sq ft home by award-winning Marcson Homes. Situated on a greenbelt with pond views, enjoy nature and community amenities like ice skating and waterparks. The open floor plan boasts a stunning kitchen with quartz countertops, upgraded appliances, and a large island. Features include a deck overlooking mature trees, a primary bedroom with ensuite, two additional bedrooms, a 4pc bath, and a walkout basement leading to a fenced yard with green space access. Added comforts include central AC, Beam Vacuum, security system, and window coverings. A unique find in Cameron Cove with a long driveway for ample parking. (31063208)

Investor Alert, seize this chance to benefit from future equity growth!!  Incredible opportunity to own a modern 2007 home in Edmonton's downtown core. This Up/Down Duplex features 'Two Fully Contained Units' with separate entrances and addresses. Nice finishing touches rare in this serene neighbourhood. Ideal for professional couples or young families seeking both independence and/or rental income. Enjoy stainless steel appliances, oak cabinetry, open layout, vaulted ceilings, ceramic, laminate & carpet flooring, and a total of five bedrooms (3-up, 2-down) with 2 full kitchens, 2 4-piece bathrooms, and 2 separate laundry rooms. Minutes walk from grocery shopping, restaurants and parks.  Minutes from the Royal Alex hospital.  Easy access to public transit and main arterial roads. (31190655)

Welcome to the Aspire built by the award-winning builder Pacesetter Homes. This is the perfect place and is perfect for a young couple of a young family. Beautiful parks and green space through out the area of The uplands. This 2 storey single family attached half duplex offers over 1400+sqft, includes Vinyl plank flooring laid through the open concept main floor. The kitchen has a lot of counter space and a full height tile back splash. Next to  the kitchen is a very cozy dining area with tons of natural light, it looks onto the large living room. Carpet throughout the second floor. This floor has a large primary bedroom, a walk-in closet, and a 3 piece ensuite. There is also two very spacious bedrooms and another 4 piece bathroom. Nestled on a beautiful tree-lined street in a prime university location with dedicated bike lane and walking path to campus and easy access to city center, Old Strathcona/Whyte Ave amenities. Baseboard, crown mouldings, decora switch, floorings and more. This home is a wonderful blend of style and functionality with various areas of living space perfect for a large, growing, or multi-generational family. The main floor  offers exceptional space for gathering, cooking and eating together. The mahogany wood accents and built in cabinetry are stunning, and the large windows provide the benefit of nautural light. The wood burning fireplace in the family room is an incredible find. There is also a bedroom, two piece bathroom, laundry room with attached garage access, and the convenience of side door that leads to the backyard. The upper flloor is where the primary along with 2 additional bedrooms are located. There is large bathroom with bathtub, seperate shower, and 2 sinks accessible from both the main hallway and the primary bedroom.The fully finished basement has 2 additional bedrooms, 3 piece bath, 2nd family room, wood burning fireplace,  and additional storage, perfect for tennagers, additional family, visiting guests, or a quiet space to read or visit. (31191800)

Approximate 2255 sq.ft. two storey mixed commercial building in Vietnam and China Town. Main floor retail currently rented for $1,500.00 per month for last over 10 years. Spacious home with a double garage on a large lot in a fantastic neighborhood. Just steps away from two top elementary schools and Harry Ainlay High School, and only a 5-minute drive to Southgate Shopping Mall. The bright living room is filled with natural light, and the renovated main floor features three bedrooms and one and a half bathrooms. The master bedroom is generously sized with a two-piece ensuite. Enjoy the open floor plan connecting the living room, dining area, and part of the kitchen. The full basement offers a huge rec room, an additional bedroom, and plenty of storage. This is also a great investment opportunity to build some sweat equity. Don't miss out! (31292799)

Prime Location in Parkallen !! Large Lot, beautiful mature street with back alley and parking pad. Semi bungalow style home, similar to a one and a half story design (Attic space developed with two upstairs bedrooms). This 1,183 Sq ft 3 plus 1 bedroom, 2 bathroom home with excellent floor-plan, big bright windows, hardwood floors, large kitchen, dining room, living room, master bedroom and 4 pc bathroom. Two more large bedrooms upstairs, fully finished basement with a second kitchen and 3 pc bathroom (not a legal suite). Shared Laundry room, new high efficiency furnace. Beautiful treed yard with patio and shed. Excellent Street Parking and great neighbourhood. Pride in ownership & well maintained. (31076452)

University area 4 bedroom home in the popular McKernan neighbourhood.  This duplex features a kitchenette in the basement with a separate entry, excellent setup for roommates. Generous lot on a picture perfect tree lined street in sought after PARKVIEW! Drive through the beautiful canopy of trees and pull up to the site of your DREAM HOME. Welcome to this beautiful half duplex located on a tree-lined street in Inglewood! Welcome to the Patch House. A solid revenue property located in McCauley. This property is well maintained by the current owner and is currently 100% occupied. NEWER HOME with TRIPLE CAR GARAGE and custom 8ft door, a true rare find! This elegant 2-storey home with separate side entrance is ideal for versatile living. Welcome Home in Deer Ridge !!! The pride in ownership shows here, the house has been very well maintained and cared for. It has an open floor plan with a bright and open layout! Welcome to a prime investment opportunity! This fully finished home is ready to impress both investors and first-time buyers alike. With three bedrooms and two and a half baths, this home caters to growing families seeking comfort and convenience. The master bedroom boasts an ensuite bath for added privacy and relaxation. Additionally, the property features a front attached single-car oversize garage, providing ample space for vehicle storage or a workshop. With the option for a separate side entrance to the basement, there's potential for further expansion or rental income if desired. (31255522)

Welcome to Glenwood, in the heart of west Edmonton. Close to schools, shopping, entertainment and dining. This 1088 sqft bungalow features detached double garage with work shop & upgraded electrical, poored concrete walks, second driveway for RV or guest parking, 2 sheds, vinyl windows, new roof and eves troughs, landscaped yard, composite decking, finished basement, kitchen skylight, gas dryer, built in closet organizers and its been meticulously maintained. Enjoy summers in the fenced in back yard, BBQ's on the patio with family and friends, entertaining in the living room or basement family room. Guests can comfortably stay over in the 4th bedroom downstairs and appreciate the 2nd bath or main soaker tub. Guy's the garage is what you've been looking for. Heated, oversized, work bench. Recently updated Bungalow in Kenilworth with 5 Bedrooms and 2 Bathrooms. Main floor renovated in 2015 with new Fridge, Dishwasher, Washer, and Dryer. Heated Oversized Garage renovated in 2023. Excellent soil conditions for the plant lover! Easy access to Sherwood Park Freeway, Anthony Henday Drive, Whitemud, Yellowhead Trail, and Downtown. Kenilworth Community League and Schools within walking distance (8min walk). This property has been owned by the family since development and has been well cared for. (31233682)

FABULOUS LOCATION!! BI-LEVEL WITH IN LAW SUITE IN THE BASEMENT!!.  5 bedroom bi-level with Nanny Suite in the lovely neighborhood of Sakaw. The kitchen is functional with ample counter and cabinet space and gives you access to the 2-tier deck in the beautiful big backyard. The basement has another 2 bedrooms, laundry room, fully renovated bath and open concept living room with Second Kitchen. Newer hot water tank & furnace, along with newer windows and the roof was recently done on the house. The garage is oversized and has electrical running to it. Ideal for large families & a great investment property; close to all the amenities you need and great schools. All 10 appliances and custom window coverings included. Dont miss out! (31008086)

Original owner custom built bungalow in excellent Evansdale location!  This executive home has features that were well before its time:  beautiful brick fireplaces up and down, bathroom with dual sinks, huge recreation room with wet bar, separate entrance to the lower level plus more!  Main floor is over 1600 sq feet and offers 3 bedrooms, 3 baths including a 3 piece ensuite and walk-in closet in the primary bedroom.  Spacious rooms throughout.  The kitchen and living room share a dual sided brick fireplace! The lower level features a second kitchen, a bedroom, a 3pce bath with sauna and a laundry area.   The separate entrance is well done and ideal for access to the lower area.   There is a large garden area, backyard patio and a large double detached heated garage.   Walking distance to schools and amenities.  New shingles 2017. (31269227)

GREAT OPPORTUNITY for First Time Home Buyers, Investors OR just rent out to help pay a mortgage. This RENOVATED Bungalow has a SEPARATE ENTRANCE with LEGAL SECONDARY SUITE. The main level features 3 bedroom,1 full bath, eating nook, contemporary two toned kitchen with quartz countertops and stainless steel appliances. The large living room is great space for entertaining.  The lower level with a separate entry has 2 bedrooms, 1 full bath, large living room and bright white kitchen with stainless steel appliances with new vinyl plank flooring. The large double garage is insulated and drywalled.  The home looks onto some lovely green space and is close to Public Transportation, Playground, the Yellowhead, and Delwood Elementary School. A must see!! (31265026)

Absolutely beautiful and extremely well cared for 1,280 sq. ft. bungalow is situated in a spectacular location only half a block from the ravine and river valley. Ample cabinets, counterspace, stainless steel appliances and moveable island in the spacious kitchen with cozy eating nook leading to a beautiful mature private back yard complete with maintenance free deck, stamped concrete patio, double garage and RV parking. The basement is fully developed with large rec/family room and 2nd wood burning fireplace, extra bedroom, large laundry room, 2 dens, cold storage and a large flex room that can be used as a workshop, craft room or anything you can imagine.  Gorgeous home in a truly exceptional quiet location! (31268364)

Charm, functionality & quality all come together in this STUNNING CHARACTER home in the desirable neighbourhood of Highlands! Across is the dining room with charming doors that provide plenty of light. The bright white kitchen has been tastefully updated with MODERN COLOURS, tiles & quartz countertops. The main floor is complete with IMMACULATE HARDWOOD FLOORING & a super trendy updated 4pce main bath. Downstairs has a large theatre/rec room, 2 bedrooms, laundry & a 3pce bath with plenty of built in storage. The FINISHING TOUCHES & DETAILS of this home are endless! Welcome Home!!! This beautiful legally suited bungalow is located in the mature neighbourhood of Balwin and is situated across from Princeton school and a large green space. Experience luxury living in this prestigious top-floor loft penthouse, boasting awe-inspiring views! Revel in the elegance of soaring 2 storey ceilings, paired w/ hrdwd floors & recessed lighting. Prestigious concreate condo in the heart of Edmonton, across from a splashpark, situated between river valley trails and Brewery District. Welcome to LUXURY LIFESTYLE LIVING at UPTOWN ESTATES & enjoy city center living at its finest. Units rarely come for sale at this building  welcome to 'The Wesley'! Step into luxury living with this executive penthouse, tucked away in the heart of Oliver. This exceptional corner suite boasts 1400 sq. ft, and features 14-foot vaulted ceilings and 9-foot ceilings throughout, creating an atmosphere of grandeur and elegance. Looking to diversify your real estate investment portfolio? Consider the advantages of side-by-side duplexes! This distinctive investment prospect presents the potential for double rental income compared to single-family properties, making it an enticing choice for astute investors like yourself. With two units housed together, you can harness rental revenue from both sides of the duplex, optimizing your cash flow. Having two units increases your capacity to attract a variety of tenants, mitigating vacancy risks and ensuring a steady stream of rental income. Whether your strategy involves renting out both units or occupying one while renting out the other, side-by-side duplexes offer adaptable options to align with your investment objectives. Ownership of a duplex facilitates quicker equity accumulation compared to single-family homes, thereby enhancing your overall financial worth. (31261849)

address: 12436 ST ALBERT TR NW|Edmonton, Alberta T5L4H1
public_remarks: Are you looking for an affordable single family home with double garage in an excellent location? This bungalow is waiting for new owners willing to do some sweat equity. This home has a bright and spacious living room which is open to the dining area with a view of the large backyard. The kitchen has lots of counterspace & upgraded  cabinets. Good size 2 bedrooms and a 4-piece full bathroom on the main level. The basement has a bedroom, den and a rumpus room + roughed-in for a 2nd bathroom. There is a separate entrance to the basement for future development. The large backyard can accommodate a lot of family activities and/or gardening! A double garage with back lane access is ready to protect your valuable toys! Close to public transit, schools, parks & shops! Minutes to downtown Edmonton or Westmount Mall! (31180243)

Welcome to the Larkspur, our spacious (1098 SQ FT - builder's size) two bed, two bath condo unit with an open floor plan, in-suite laundry and energy efficient heat pump system for heating and cooling. The kitchen features Quarter countertops for a modern touch, stainless steel appliances and soft-close cabinets and drawers. LVP flooring throughout with carpet in bedrooms and LVT in bathrooms. Enjoy your master suite with generously sized walk-in closets and ensuite. Socialize with friends & neighbours in the library, amenity room & in-building gym. One underground parking stall included with car wash bay for residents. Small pets up to 20lbs, larger with board approval. (31142660)

public_remarks: Discover the elegance of Mosaic Ridge in this well maintained townhome, ideally situated near the Terwillegar Recreation Centre, Transit Centre, and local schools. This end unit boasts a fenced front yard, facing tranquil green space and conveniently close to visitor parking. Open concept layout featuring ceramic tile entry and door closet. The living and dining areas are adorned with Maple Cherry hardwood floors and bathed in natural light from large windows and a balcony, perfect for relaxing outdoors. The kitchen offers a chefs dream with upgraded white cabinets, expansive countertop space, a raised serving bar, modern backsplash, and stainless steel appliances. A guest 2-piece bath with a pedestal sink is located on the main floor. Upstairs, the large master bedroom provides a serene retreat with ample windows, a walk-in closet, and a full ensuite bath. Two additional bedrooms offer flexibility and comfort. The developed lower level includes direct access to the  double attached garage and laundry. (31233453)

FANTASTIC GARNEAU LOCATION IN THE HEART OF THE UNIVERSITY AREA! IMMACULATE, NICELY UPGRADED END UNIT TOWNHOUSE! HEATED U/G PARKING! Welcome to Grandin Manor! FUNKY NEW YORK STYLE LOFT CENTRALLY LOCATED AT THE HEART OF THE DOWNTOWN WAREHOUSE DISTRICT STEPS FROM ICE DISTRICT, MACEWAN UNIVERSITY, NORQUEST COLLEGE, FUTURE LRT STATION & JASPER AVE! SOUTH FACING, 180 DEGREE RIVERVALLEY VIEWS! 2 Bed, 2 Bath, large open concept 1200 Sq Ft 8th floor condo awaiting your personal touch! Offering, vinyl windows, a massive deck with breath taking views, 2 large underground stalls, and same floor laundry PLUS storage! Welcome to the Fairmont! This iconic well built concrete building, often sells at a premium, this unit will not last long, a MUST SEE! (30239791)

Welcome to The Glenora in the heart of downtown Edmonton and is a 45+ building. Offering views of the river valley & downtown from every room of this 1209 sqft apartment style condo. Extensively renovated 4-level split home in Lago Lindo with move-in-ready quick possession available. STEP-UP FROM THE TYPICALLY BLAND UNIVERSITY-AREA CONDOS! This beautifully renovated 2-bedroom condo is mere steps from the U of A, LRT/public transit, Whyte Ave & the River Valley! Meticulous 1038ft, 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom condo in the highly sought after Meridian Plaza building! The unit looks like the it's in the same condition as the day it was built, 10/10. Welcome to the heartbeat of urban livingthis sleek 2 bedroom condo nestled in the vibrant university area,tailored for the dynamic young professional.Step into a space where style meets convenience,boasting chic furnishings and abundant natural light that dance across modern interiors.The open-concept layout seamlessly integrates a trendy living room with a gourmet kitchenperfect for entertaining or whipping up culinary delights after a hectic day in the office.Retreat to the master suite,an oasis of comfort with its plush bedding and a private en-suite bathroom, offering a sanctuary for relaxation and unwinding after the hustle and bustle of city life.The second bedroom,versatile and adaptable,provides an ideal space for a home office or a cozy guest retreat.Step outside onto your private balcony,a personal haven to savor morning coffee or to soak in the vibrant cityscape.With its prime location,this condo ensures seamless access to trendy cafes,chic boutiques,and buzzing hotspots-promising a lifestyle (31227576)

Welcome to this 2 bedroom (1 den) & 2 bath main floor condo in prestigious Belgravia. This unit is unique because it has a private green space connected to the oversized patio. This well maintained bungalow, situated right across from H.E. Beriault school, offers a warm & inviting space for the next family to create memories. Nestled on a quiet street in the neighborhood of Grandin, this charming bungalow presents a prime opportunity for investors & first-time homebuyers alike. Facing the quiet residential street, this corner unit property offers the convenience of a condominium with easy access and extra parking! Welcome to the vibrant & scenic community of The Uplands. An upscale & developing community in sought after Southwest Edmonton with parks, trails, new schools & all amenities close by. Welcome to the highly sought after CONSERVATORY! Ideally located in Avonmore backing onto the Millcreek ravine! What a RARE find - Wheelchair accessible! This unique original owner 2 bed, 1 1/2 bath condo is nestled in the quaint community of Parkallen. Just down the street is the community centre, park, community garden, coffee shop, bakery & more! You will be impressed with everything that this unit and area has to offer! (31064039)

Great opportunity to own this lovely 2 bedroom 2 bathroom unit in this steel and concrete building in the heart of Parkallen! Discover the canvas for your dream home in the heart of Allendale! This prime, vacant lot offers a rare opportunity to craft your vision amidst a thriving, established community. Nestled in a sought-after neighborhood, embrace the tranquility of suburban living while relishing the convenience of urban access. Welcome to this fantastic home in Kiniski Gardens. PLATINUM PROPERTY!! Welcome to your ideal home here in Kiniski Gardens. Conveniently located near walking paths, ravine access, schools, and shopping, with easy access to Anothony Henday and Whitemud for commuting ease. (31259406)

ORIGINAL OWNER has loved this location for years! Ideally located across from the School with OPEN PARKS AND TRAILS TO THE LAKES, with Shopping, Restaurants and stores all close by. IMMACULATE TOP FLOOR 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom condo in desirable The Californian. INVESTOR ALERT / RENOVATION READY / 2 BED 1 BATH DOWNTOWN:  Here's your chance to transform this hidden gem in Prince Charles, Edmonton! Spacious & spotless one bed/bath Bedford Arms condo in the community of La Perle. All amenities within a 10-15 minute walk including West Edmonton Mall, Where Else can you find a deal like this!? Experience breathtaking views of Downtown from this stunning 1-bedroom condo. Com and enjoy living with the great views from the windows and large balcony. Fully renovated (2022) home in Alberta Avenue boasts over 1300 sq ft. Ideal for families or investors, close to NAIT, schools, and amenities. address: 14512 STONY PLAIN RD NW|Edmonton, Alberta T5N3S1
public_remarks: Experience the epitome of urban living in this delightful 1,520 sq ft townhouse nestled in Grovenor. Offering 3 bedrooms (2 upstairs, 1 on the main floor) and 3 bathrooms, this home seamlessly blends style with functionality. The main floor boasts a bright, open living area featuring a cozy three-sided fireplace, perfect for entertaining or relaxation. With laundry conveniently located upstairs, chores are a breeze. Enjoy 2 decks and a double attached garage for added convenience. Easy access to Mackinnon Ravine's scenic trails and lush landscapes enhances the allure of this home. And with a future LRT stop nearby, commuting is effortless. Welcome home! (31193684)

GREAT LOCATION! TANDEM ATTACHED GARAGE! PLENTY OF SPACE! Looking for convenient GATED downtown living only steps to Macewan University and Jasper Ave? This is it! This 2 bedroom, 2 bath + LOFT / HOME OFFICE / FUTURE BEDROOM (add a sprinkler) shows well and exudes pride of ownership! Stairway lead to the OPEN CONCEPT second floor which brings together a large L-shaped white kitchen w/ access to the maintenance free deck! Spacious dining / living area with soaring ceilings brings a great vibe to the home. 2 beds on the floor including the primary w/ 4 pce ensuite, laundry, and an additional 3 pce bath for guests. Upstairs brings a large loft space for extra living, home office, storage, etc! Park your cars with the tandem double garage, or park 1 and use the rest for extra storage. A desired area with many amenities and parks nearby; don't miss it! (31182230)

This one CHECKS all the BOXES! This 1/2 duplex offers ALL the perks of a detached house without the price tag!  Boasting 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, a separate SIDE entrance to the fully finished basement with newer flooring,  HUGE finished and heated detached garage, RV/toy parking , full sized corner lot with awesome deck under private mature trees, loads of street parking on the side & enclosed dog run with turf!  Updates to the home are endless and include newer vinyl windows, shingles, furnace, A/C, Hot water tank, basement flooring & main bath renovation.  Nothing to do here but move in and enjoy all the space!  Main floor with big living room with full wall of windows to the front street, kitchen offers solid wood cabinets, open to dining area, completing main level is convenient 2 piece bath, upper level home to 3 good sized bedroom sharing updated 4 piece bath with soaker tub, lower level has a bedroom, living room, full 3 piece bath, laundry & mechanical. Shows 10/10 immediate possession available! (31225206)

UNIQUE OPPORTUNITY - Condo Fee incentive being offered! Fall in LOVE with Waterside Estates! This elegant 2 bed, 2 bath corner suite has an open concept design w/9' ceilings, hardwood floors, stainless steel appliances, granite counters, subway tile, low profile stove, eat-up bar and pantry. The primary bedroom has room for a king & includes dual vanities in ensuite & spacious custom walk in closet. Enjoy the CITY VIEWS from your deck with gas bbq outlet. An oversize laundry room, titled UG stall with storage & additional storage cage ensure you have a place for everything. Welcome home to your new townhouse condo in Ozerna! This 1560 sf, 2 story home has 4 bedrooms & 3.5 bathrooms. 2 BED 2 BATH CORNER UNIT CONDO WITHIN WALKING DISTANCE TO UNIVERSITY OF ALBERTA! Welcome to Riverbank Landing!! A premium Live, Work & Play development on the Banks of the Sturgeon River Valley. Discover Magrath Mansion, an adult-only residence crafted w/ comfort & convenience. Ideal for downsizers transitioning to condo living or young professionals. Welcome to this awesome downtown loft! Fabulous location and within walking distance to Grant MacEwan University, Rogers Arena, and Ice District. Featuring an open design with 1382 square feet. One UNDERGROUND parking space and potential to rent a second outdoor stall.  Shared assigned storage unit on the same floor. Come and enjoy the best of condo living downtown! (30869090)

Welcome to THE SIERRAS OF INGLEWOOD! Conveniently located steps from shopping, medical offices, banks, restaurants, bus routes & the Sturgeon Hospital. Opportunity knocks with this over 1600 square foot raised bungalow in the up-and-coming community of Inglewood. Some upgrades include shingles in 2011, furnaces done in 2005 and hot water tanks done recently. Double detached garage is 25 x 23 and parking in the back on concrete for 6 vehicles. (31249791)

WELCOME to this well maintained AIR CONDITIONED and freshly painted 1226 sqft 4 level split home in Kilkenny featuring 3 bedrooms upstairs, 2 full bath, and fully finished below-grade (lower main + basement) offers extra 1039 sqft living space including another full bathroom and 2 large living spaces, laundry room and storage. The Mainfloor features an updated kitchen next to the open concept sun-soaked living, dining room appointed with extra large windows and a beautiful gas fireplace offering a welcoming atmosphere. Upstairs you will find 3 good sized bedrooms, a 4pc shared bath plus a 3 pc ensuite bath. The fully finished lower level and basement offers massive family/rec area. The lower level you could easily add a wall to make a 4th bedroom. The yard is fully fenced and beautifully landscaped with a lovely deck right off the dining room. That's not all, there is also an attached 22' x 24' garage. Close to JA Fife School, shopping, transit and more. This beautiful home is ready for a new family! (31283867)

Located on a tree-lined street in the sought-after community, this charming Raised bungalow has an in-law Suite (virtually staged). Main floors circular-flow floor plan, gives convenient access while maintaining privacy. Living room (opener windows/French doors) leads to Dining & huge Kitchen (plenty of cabinets/SS appliances). Primary/2nd Bedroom/4-piece Bath. Back entrance to common Laundry/Utility (storage) & spacious Suite (high ceilings/huge windows/vinyl plank flooring). Timeless detail, pride of ownership & an eye for decorating, the owners have created an amazing home. Walk to River Valley (trails/Capilano Foot Bridge) & 112 AVE shops/restaurants. Fabulous! (31253218)

Rare find! RENOVATED 3 bedroom 2 bath, 1362 sq. ft. executive condo unit in Garneau. FANTASTIC VIEWS! Welcome To Uptown Estates & Start Your Uptown Living At It's Finest. Inviting Entrance Into The Building Where You Will Find A Well Equipped Gym Plus Social Room. Welcome to Symphony Towers, an iconic landmark in the heart of Downtown Edmonton. Welcome to Ermine Village, where this exceptional townhome awaits you! Nestled on a tranquil street backing onto a sprawling greenspace and an elementary school, this end-unit townhouse boasts 3 bedrooms and a host of desirable features, including a rare DOUBLE ATTACHED GARAGE. WELCOME HOME to this modern & trendy townhome in the popular Brio in Schonsee. One of the Best views in the whole Building (Lake View!), coupled with low Condo Fees, makes this SW High-Rise 9th Floor Apartment an impossibly rare find!! AVAILABLE NOW! U of A neighborhood with access to the river valley parkway and just a 6 minute commute to downtown! Over 1200 square feet of space in this 2 bedroom 2 bathroom third floor unit. Welcome to this TOP FLOOR CORNER UNIT in the desirable Traditions at Riverside building. Shepherd's Gardens, a wonderful, well maintained hi-rise with an excellent location close to shopping, services, hospital & public transportation (bus & LRT). Parking stall is titled & in the heated parkade (P1)(stall #146) & the titled storage locker (S17) is located on P2 (room C). Additional amenities in this building include a massive rooftop deck with access from the 4th floor & a social room with full kitchen & washrooms located on the main floor (available for private functions). Welcome to Hudson House. Fabulous city centre/downtown location! Step into this amazing 5 bedroom raised bungalow duplex in a cool neighborhood! It's been totally fixed up and looks super nice. You've got two separate units you can rent out legally. And get this  you can live in one and be the landlord for the other! Inside, everything is fairly new. The kitchens have shiny new appliances, perfect for cooking up your favorite meals. Plus, there's a heater system that's been updated in 2022, so you'll always be cozy, warm and flooded with natural sun light from the huge windows. But it's not just about the inside. This two electrical meter raised bungalow duplex is in a really cool area that's getting better all the time. There are lots of fun places nearby, like cool cafes and stores. It's like being part of a big, exciting family. So, if you're looking for a great place to live or a smart investment opportunity, this legal raised bungalow duplex is the way to go. It's comfy, it's convenient, and it's waiting for you to move in! (31198043)

This contemporary corner unit, which is PET-FRIENDLY, is a must-see! Located in one of the best areas downtown Edmonton has to offer, it features a spacious 740sqft double wraparound patio adorned with trees, and a gas hookup. The interior boasts upgraded high-end concrete flooring, a modern kitchen, and an open-concept living space with 9 ceilings, granite counters, stainless steel appliances, and white cabinets, creating an inviting atmosphere. The kitchen seamlessly connects to the living area, brightly lit by oversized windows and a corner gas fireplace. Further down the hall, you'll discover a large master bedroom with an upgraded ensuite, a second bedroom, a second full bathroom with a jacuzzi tub, and a laundry room equipped with custom cabinetry for additional storage. This residence offers secure and underground heated parking, along with an extra secure storage unit. Conveniently located just 1 block away from Jasper Ave and providing easy access to the River valley paths. This is a MUST SEE! (31052460)
